info.name: Halfling (2024)
info.description: Halfling species from the 2024 Player's Handbook for Aurora Builder (no subraces/lineages).
info.author: Aurora Builder
Wizards of the Coast

description.p: Small in stature but big in heart, halflings blend courage, luck, and quiet footwork.
Lucky. When you roll a 1 on the d20 for a d20 Test, you can reroll the die, and you must use the new roll.
Brave. You have advantage on saving throws to avoid or end the Frightened condition on yourself.
Halfling Nimbleness. You can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than yours.
In 2024, species don't grant Ability Score Increases or languages; those come from Origin (Background + chosen languages).
